name: Three Sevens Logic Brain Teaser Classic Puzzle
name_original: Three Sevens Logic Brain Teaser Classic Puzzle
description:
Three Sevens is challenging game about summing numbers and make three 7's.

Your goal is to form at least three 7's - horizontally or vertically. More 7's will give you more points.

You can create sevens by summing numbers - to do that, you must push numbers from four sides - top, right, bottom, left. When you push number on other number they will sum if their sum is equal or lower then 7.

This game is challenging, requires planning and time. If you're looking for quick, easy, casual logic games, better check our other games. Otherwise you should try it.
